name: Beast of the Dread Star - Jam Edition
name_original: Beast of the Dread Star - Jam Edition
description:
Any space faring race can tell you there is one creature among the stars whose violence and bloodlust is unmatched by any other, the Beasts of the Dread Star. Leaving almost no survivors from their exploits, they are more legend and myth than facts. A horror story told to spook fresh crewmates.

A member of a research vessel exploring a newly charted star system, you receive a distress signal from a ship in a crew you are taking over duties of and relieving.

You board the ship to investigate and find it seemingly abandoned, until you come face to face with one of the Beasts yourself. Will you live to tell the tale, or fade into the legend of the Dread Star?

Made for Beregon's 'Themed Horror Game Jam #6'
